scripts.all-in-one: $npm_execpath run prepare-for-build && $npm_execpath run format && git add . && git commit -m 'wrote something' && git push && $npm_execpath run build && $npm_execpath redirects && until $npm_execpath ship; do :; done
scripts.all-in-one:dev: $npm_execpath run prepare-for-build && $npm_execpath run format && $npm_execpath run start
scripts.all-in-one:qa: $npm_execpath run prepare-for-build && $npm_execpath run format && $npm_execpath run build &&  $npm_execpath serve
scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=16384" docusaurus build --locale en && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=16384" docusaurus build --locale ko
scripts.clear: rm -rf 'blog' && rm -rf 'docs' && rm -f '**/*.config.js' && rm -f '**/*.config.js.map' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.md' && cp tools/안녕하세요.md i18n/ko/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current/Hey.md && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.png' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.svg' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.jpg' && rm -rf 'i18n /**/*.jpeg'
scripts.prepare-for-build: $npm_execpath run clear && $npm_execpath run sanitize && $npm_execpath run bundle && $npm_execpath run wikilinks && $npm_execpath run backlinks && $npm_execpath run swc && $npm_execpath run figcaption && $npm_execpath run readme && $npm_execpath run scc
scripts.readme:
cp tools/README.src.md README.md && echo "

## Last updated 

$(date)
" >> README.md
scripts.scc:
printf '
## Stats
' >> README.md && printf '
```
' >> README.md && scc . >> README.md && printf '```
' >> README.md
scripts.swc: swc docusaurus.config.ts -o docusaurus.config.js && swc config/*.ts -d config/
